subpacks.name:
§aBalanced 

§6Removes all unobtainable items, as well as remove items that you might want to unlock yourself, such as music discs.

§cObtainable Only 

§bRemoves all of the items you can not get in survival mode from this add-on.

§eFull Version 

§dIncludes all of the 84 crafting recipes, including ones you can't obtain in survival.
